verses.name: Appendix: Acts and Records 1:1
verses.text: Acts and Records of the Famous Controversy About the Baptism of Heretics: A Roman Council Celebrated Under Stephen.

verses.name: Appendix: Acts and Records 1:2
verses.text: From the Synodal Roll.

verses.name: Appendix: Acts and Records 1:3
verses.text: A divine and sacred provincial synod, gathered together at Rome by Stephen, the blessed martyr and father which excommunicated those who in an African synod had, without reason, conceded that they who came to the Catholic Church from any heresy should be re-baptized.

verses.name: Appendix: Acts and Records 1:4
verses.text: Carthaginian Councils.

verses.name: Appendix: Acts and Records 1:5
verses.text: The Third Carthaginian Council Under Cyprian, on the Baptism of Infants; Held Anno Domini.

verses.name: Appendix: Acts and Records 1:6
verses.text: This document is translated at p.
